pkgmetadata.longdescription: Examples using 'RcppClassic' to Interface R and C++ // The 'Rcpp' package contains a C++ library that facilitates the integration of R and C++ in various ways via a rich API. This API was preceded by an earlier version which has been deprecated since 2010 (but is still supported to provide backwards compatibility in the package 'RcppClassic'). This package 'RcppClassicExamples' provides usage examples for the older, deprecated API. There is also a corresponding package 'RcppExamples' with examples for the newer, current API which we strongly recommend as the basis for all new development.
